task.title: Step 1. Installing the
task.shortdesc: You can use Cloudera Manager to install, distribute, and activate the on a cluster. When dealing with multiple clusters, perform the following steps on each cluster.

context.p: This documentation includes details about Cloudera Manager to simplify the installation and configuration process. For more information about using Cloudera Manager, see the Cloudera documentation.

step.cmd: Copy the StreamSets parcel file to the Cloudera Manager Local Parcel Repository Path. By default, the path is /opt/cloudera/parcel-repo.
step.info: StreamSets provides different parcel files for different operating systems. Use the parcel file appropriate for the target operating system.

To verify the path to use, in Cloudera Manager, click Administration Settings . In the navigation panel, select the Parcels category.
Place the parcel file in the path configured for Local Parcel Repository Path.

step.cmd: To view the list of available parcels, in the menu bar, click the Parcels icon: .
step.info: The StreamSets parcel displays in the list of available parcels. If it doesn't display, click Check for New Parcels.

step.cmd: To download the parcel to the local repository, click the Download button.
step.info: After the parcel is downloaded, the Download button becomes the Distribute button.

step.cmd: To distribute the parcel to the cluster, click the Distribute button.
step.info: After distribution, the Distribute button becomes the Activate button.

step.cmd: To activate the parcel, click the Activate button.
